title: Australian diary. No. 051
creator_credit: Australian National Film Board and Jack S. Allan
brief_description: The following items are featured in this interesting cinemagazine: the whaling season is in fuu swing in Western Australia; the inauguration of the Melbourne-Christchurch air service between Australia and New Zealand; machines take over the tapestry workers’ art and cattle judges have decisions put to the test at Sydney Fat Stock Show.
creator_credit_for_label: Australian National Film Board and Jack S. Allan
